about_the_game:
This is an PRE-ALPHA DEMO. It contains base structure of the game.

Just for you to experience bare minimum of the Express Car Wash Simulator!

If you encounter any issues, you can issue them on our Discord channel / our Steam group.

Thanks in advance and have fun!
